segments.text: I'm not sure . What does it look like ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's quite a delicate piece of equipment , so I hope it was well-packed . It's oblong-shaped , about 50 cm long . It's made of metal .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There's a large wooden crate in the corner which I haven't unpacked yet . It might be in there .
segments.speaker: S2
